property.name: Type
property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) [CONSTANT]: At the start of your Rejuvenation Step, place the top card of your discard pile at the bottom of your Life Deck. When this card is leaving play, search your Life Deck for a Dragon Ball and place it into play.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) [CONSTANT]: Players cannot use card effects to search a player's Life Deck.

property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) [CONSTANT]: Dragon Balls lose all effects.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) [CONSTANT]: Players cannot use Setups unless they have performed an attack from their hand this turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.value: (Villains only.) POWER: Banish Dr. Wheelo to choose an Ally, Drill, or Setup in play and shuffle that card into its owner's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) [CONSTANT]: The first attack each player performs during combat cannot have its damage modified.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) POWER: Place the top 3 Styled Events in your discard pile at the bottom of your Life Deck. Shuffle 'Lord Slug' into your Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) [CONSTANT]: If your MP is a Saiyan, your Styled attacks deal +X stages of damage. X = the number of Saiyans in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Whenever your opponent reveals his hand, you may look at the top 2 cards of a player's Life Deck. If you do, you may place any of those cards at the bottom of that player's Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage. Whenever your opponent performs an attack, banish the top card of your opponent's discard pile

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. Raise your anger 1 level.

property.value: (You may play this card to stop an energy attack.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 4 life cards.

property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Physical attack. DAMAGE: 4 stages. Your MP gains 4 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 6 stages. Name 2 cards. Your opponent reveals the top 4 cards of his Life Deck. If both cards you named were revealed, this attack deals +6 life cards of damage and cannot be stopped.

property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 3. Stops an energy attack. Raise your anger 1 level.

property.value: Stops a physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. Your opponent plays with his hand revealed until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Energy attack costing 1 stage. DAMAGE: 3 life cards. You may raise or lower a player's anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Whenever you lower your opponent's anger, banish the top card of your opponent's discard pile. Whenever you lower your opponent's anger and your MP's level is higher than your opponent's MP's level, Rejuvenate 1.

property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 6 life cards. Raise your anger 1 level. You may raise your opponent's anger 1 level. If your opponent's anger is 4 or higher, this attack cannot be stopped.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 6 life cards. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. You do not have to pay power stage costs for your next Styled energy attack this combat. HIT: Your MP gains 4 stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. Stops a physical attack. If your opponent's anger level is 0, raise your anger 2 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. Physical attack. DAMAGE: 1 life card. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. HIT: Your opponent destroys the top X card of his Life Deck. X = 6 - his current anger level.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is in your discard pile, as an action you may banish three Physical Combat cards from your discard pile to place this card into play.) [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 stage of damage. While you control 3 or more Dragon Balls, your attacks deal +2 stages of damage instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text

property.name: Type

property.value: (Villains only. Banish after use.) Physical attack. DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Rejuvenate a Styled card from your Banished Zone not named Namekian Clench.

property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Stops a physical attack. Your Dragon Balls cannot be captured this combat.

property.value: (Banish after use.) Stops an energy attack. Attach to your MP. While attached, whenever you perform an attack you may choose for that attack to deal its life card damage as power stages of damage instead. Banish this card when your opponent uses a critical damage effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Rejuvenate 1. Search your Life Deck for a Drill or Ally and play it. Dragon Balls lose all effects this combat.

property.name: Type

property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your Styled physical attacks deal +2 stages of damage and gain - Raise your anger 1 level.

property.value: ENDURANCE 1. Stops a physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. Your AT damage is considered to be 4 for your Styled attacks this combat.

property.name: Text

property.value: (Banish after use.) Energy attack costing 1 stage. DAMAGE: 2 life cards. Raise your anger 2 levels. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels.

property.value: (Banish after use.) [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Use a critical damage effect. Your MP gains 2 stages. Draw the bottom card of your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Players can only attack or pass in their actions this combat. Draw 2 cards and then discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. Banish after use.) POWER: Search your Life Deck for a Drill and place it into play. You may banish a Drill you control. If you do, end combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. Banish after use.) [INSTANT] POWER: Use at the start of your opponent's turn. If your opponent does not declare combat this turn then at the start of the Rejuvenation Step, your opponent banishes the top 2 cards of his Life Deck and you may banish a total of up to 2 Setups and/or Drills.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is Rejuvenated, you may place it into play instead.) POWER: All of your opponent's personalities lose 3 stages.

property.name: Type

property.value: (Villains only. Banish after use.) Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +1 stage. You may shuffle an attached card in play into its owner's Life Deck. If you do, this attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) POWER: Search your Life Deck for three different Styled Physical Combat or Energy Combat cards and reveal them. Your opponent chooses one of those cards. Place that card into your hand and destroy the remaining cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: (When this card is discarded or destroyed from your Life Deck, destroy the top 3 cards of your opponent's Life Deck and banish this card.) POWER: Your opponent cannot play Events this combat. Gain 2 stages and shuffle this card into your Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) POWER: Destroy the top 3 cards of your opponent's Life Deck. You may lower your MP 1 level. If you do, destroy the top 5 instead.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. Banish after use.) [INSTANT] POWER: Use after taking damage from an attack. You may advance or lower your MP 1 level. Rejuvenate 4.

property.value: (If an Ally performs this attack, it costs 0 stages and deals +2 life cards of damage.) ENDURANCE 1. Energy attack costing 3 stages. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. If any damage from this attack is prevented, Rejuvenate this card and the bottom card of your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck. Banish after use.) POWER: Search your Life Deck for a Namek Dragon Ball with a number in the title that is less than or equal to your MP's personality level and play it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. Destroy X Allies. X = your MP's level.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your Energy Combat attacks gain, HIT: Raise your anger 1 level and your MP gains 3 stages.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Discard a card from your hand to perform a non-Styled physical attack dealing AT +2 stages.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may discard this card from your hand to perform a non-Styled physical attack dealing 3 stages of damage.) [CONSTANT]: Your AT damage is considered to be 4 for your Styled attacks.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: When this Drill is leaving play, you may banish it to search your Life Deck for a copy of Red Dazing Drill and place it into your hand. The first time your anger is lowered during combat, your opponent skips his next action this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) ENDURANCE 1. Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: AT +2 stages. You may raise your anger 1 level. Search your discard pile or Banished Zone for a Drill and place it into play.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand by an opponent's effect, draw a card and raise your anger 1 level.) ENDURANCE 2. Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his hand, draw a card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Energy attack costing 1 stage. DAMAGE: 3 life cards. Attach to your MP. While attached when your MP changes levels, return this card to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) POWER: Search your Life Deck for a Named Setup and place it into play.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 3. Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 4 life cards. HIT: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for a Styled Drill and place it into play.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 4 stages. For the remainder of combat, life card damage from your attacks is banished.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +4 stages. Your opponent cannot gain stages this combat.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (You cannot win by MPPV if you advance a personality level with this card.) Physical attack. DAMAGE: 6 stages. Damage from your attacks cannot be prevented this combat. HIT: You may advance your MP 1 level. If you do, advance your opponent's MP 1 level.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Use only if you have not performed an attack this combat. This attack cannot have its damage modified. Banish after use.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 10 life cards. If stopped, banish your discard pile.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. You may place a Syled Setup from your hand into play. If you do, you may raise or lower a player's anger 2 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) [CONSTANT]: If your MP is a Saiyan, your Styled attacks deal +X stages of damage. X = the number of Saiyans in play.
